data.comment: The match is underway in Mexico City.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 2, Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Throw-in for Guadalajara at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
In the minute 6, Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal! Uriel Antuna gives Guadalajara a 0-1 lead.
That's a fine assist from Isaac Brizuela.
In the minute 8, Ball safe as Guadalajara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Pumas UNAM have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Pumas UNAM in Mexico City.
In the minute 10, Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Throw-in for Guadalajara in their own half.
Guadalajara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 13, Can Pumas UNAM get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Guadalajara's half?
Nicolas Freire of Pumas UNAM gets in a strike, but is off target.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Guadalajara a goal kick.
In the minute 17, Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Nicolas Freire equalizes with a header to make it 1-1.
In the minute 18, Facundo Waller instrumental with a fine assist.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 22, Throw-in Guadalajara.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
Alan Mozo (Pumas UNAM) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 29, Guadalajara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Guadalajara in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Guadalajara have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
In the minute 31, Ball goes out of play for a Pumas UNAM goal kick.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
In the minute 36, Uriel Antuna for the away team is judged to be offside.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
In the minute 38, Johan Vasquez (Pumas UNAM) has received a first yellow card.
Goal! A Jesus Molina header gives Guadalajara a 1-2 lead in Mexico City.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
At Estadio Olimpico Universitario, Facundo Waller has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Jesus Sanchez for Guadalajara has been booked by Cesar Arturo Ramos and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 43, Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Guadalajara.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Guadalajara.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Juan Vigon (Pumas UNAM) has received a yellow card from Cesar Arturo Ramos.
The second half has started at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In Mexico City Guadalajara attack through Alexis Vega. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 46, Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in the half of Guadalajara.
Guadalajara's Isaac Brizuela gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Olimpico Universitario. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 50, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Guadalajara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Guadalajara have a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Facundo Waller gets his shot on target but fails to score for Pumas UNAM.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 54, Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the home team a throw-in.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
Throw-in for Guadalajara at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 57, Juan Iturbe is replacing Facundo Waller for the home team.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
In the minute 60, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM's Juan Dinenno is whistled for offside at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Pumas UNAM's Juan Dinenno misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 64, Goal kick for Guadalajara at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Guadalajara.
In the minute 67, It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
Ball goes out of play for a Guadalajara goal kick.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
In the minute 69, Pumas UNAM are coming forward and Juan Vigon gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Guadalajara goal kick.
The home team replace Juan Dinenno with Leonel Lopez.
In the minute 72, Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in Guadalajara's half.
Guadalajara awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 75, Guadalajara will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM pushes forward through Juan Iturbe, whose finish on goal is saved.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 76, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Guadalajara in their own half.
Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
Guadalajara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 79, Carlos Gonzalez is on target to level the scores at 2-2.
Great play from Alan Mozo to set up the goal.
Alan Torres is on a sub for Jesus Angulo for Guadalajara.
In the minute 81, Pumas UNAM to take a throw-in in Guadalajara territory.
Pumas UNAM are pushing forward but Leonel Lopez's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
In the minute 82, Guadalajara's Jesus Angulo misses with an attempt on goal.
Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Corner awarded to Guadalajara.
Throw-in for Guadalajara in the half of Pumas UNAM.
Throw-in Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Attention is being given to Guadalajaraâ€™s Jesus Molina and play has been suspended briefly.
Victor Vucetich is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Olimpico Universitario with Oscar Macias replacing Jesus Molina.
In the minute 86, Pumas UNAM make their third substitution with Brian Figueroa replacing Favio Alvarez.
Free kick for Guadalajara in their own half.
Alan Mozo has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
In the minute 88, Miguel Ponce is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Jesus Molina for Guadalajara is back on the field again.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Guadalajara at Estadio Olimpico Universitario.
It's 2-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
